ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
hi=java.get("hi");
hia=hi.match(/pageStart=(\d+)/)[1]
java.log(hia)
a = java.get("c");
b=String(a).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,'$1').replace(/\"/g,'').replace(/\s/g,'');
//java.log(b)
if (typeof b == 'string') {
    b = b.split(','); 
}
//java.log(nextChapterUrl)
c = nextChapterUrl.match(/pageStart= {0,1}(\d+)/);
c = parseInt(c[1]); 
results = [];
for (i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
        currentPage = parseInt(b[i]);
        if (isNaN(currentPage)) {
            continue;
        }
        if (currentPage > c) {
            break;
        }
        if (currentPage > hia && currentPage < c) {
            url = baseUrl.replace(/(pageStart=)\d+/, '$1' + currentPage);
            results.push(url);
        }
    }results
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var $ = JSON.parse(result).result;
var i = 0, j = 0, ch = {};
var k = $.chapter.length;
var l = $.page.length;
var b=$.page
$.c=java.log(JSON.stringify(b))
java.put("c",$.c)
while(j<l) {
  if (i<k) {
    ch = $.chapter[i];
    while(+ch.pos>$.page[j]) {
      ch.no = $.page[j];
      ch.page = "Page "+(j+1);
      $.page[j] = ch;
      j++;
    }
    i++;
  } else {
    ch = $.chapter[k-1];
    ch.no = $.page[j];
    ch.page = "Page "+(j+1);
    $.page[j] = ch;
    j++;
  }
}
JSON.stringify($.page);
</js>
